articles.description: Build-up to Euro 2024 as England arrive in Germany while Scotland train again before their opener with Germany on Friday, plus the latest football and transfer news.
articles.title: Euro 2024 build-up: England arrive and Scotland prepare for Friday's opener

articles.description: England manager Gareth Southgate says Euro 2024 could be his "last chance" to win a trophy with England.
articles.title: England: Gareth Southgate says Euro 2024 could be last chance to win with national team

articles.description: France boss Didier Deschamps won the World Cup as a player and manager and now he is aiming to achieve the same feat in the European Championship.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Didier Deschamps bids to make more history with France

articles.description: Scott McTominay may not always be appreciated at Manchester United, but his "endless warrior spirit" makes him invaluable for Scotland, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Euro 2024: 'Resilience defines Scotland warrior McTominay'

articles.description: Former England goalkeeper Joe Hart, who will be a BBC pundit at Euro 2024, on his new role and why England can go all the way.
articles.title: Joe Hart's BBC Sport column: 'Winning these Euros not just down to having the best players'

articles.description: Roger Federer shares the lessons he learned from a legendary tennis career at a graduation ceremony in the United States.
articles.title: Roger Federer: Effortless tennis a myth says Swiss great in graduation speech

articles.description: Head coach Steve Borthwick urges his young England players not to “stay in the shadows” as they look to make history this summer.
articles.title: Steve Borthwick: England coach urges young players not to 'stay in the shadows'

articles.description: BBC F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions following the Canadian Grand Prix.
articles.title: F1 Q&A after Canadian GP: Ricciardo, Sainz, Verstappen, Perez, 2026 regulations

articles.description: Table tennis player Bruna Alexandre is set to become the first Brazilian to play at both the Olympics and Paralympics.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Brazil Paralympian selected for Olympics

articles.description: A group of athletes speak to BBC Sport's Laura Scott about being new mums and the importance of pelvic floor health.
articles.title: Pelvic floor: Athlete mums on the importance of pelvic floor health
